replies.body: You threw insults though, you can do a lot less than that to get suspended so consider yourself lucky that you wernt permd.

>4 man reports me

That's literally the same as having 1 person report you.

>I've never been suspended and I haven't even played since july.

So I assume that by suspension, you mean ban. If you received chat-restrictions beforehand, then going down levels is based on games played. Not time.

first 2 sentences in game alrdy warrant a punishement if you do that on a frequent level.

as you said yourself, you had a punishement and didnt play many games after that so your account status was still "fresh of the punishement" and then all you did this game was flame.
you ran right into their trap, baiting you to flame. now you got punished not only for the flame but also for the stupidity.

the 14 day ban is a last warning and hopefully a reminder to not fall for such obvious traps.

Yeah that all looks pretty reportable and rule breaking, I completely understand that your teammates were dogshit cancer, but what matters is whether or not you engaged them in arguing and flaming or not. report them after and the system will do whatever it does, if they get banned so be it, if they continue to troll then it's only a matter of time until the system does penalize them. But you, arguing and flaming in response to their arguing/flaming/trolling, is pretty much just as bad as whatever they are doing because all you are doing is contributing to more of the bullshit.

Alright mate, let's take a look-see at your chat history and see if reports were warranted.

In summary:

I read your notes on context as well. You're probably not a negative player by nature, but your behavior certainly worthy of report and a sanction. Depending on your previous sanctions/punishments it 'could' be a suspension or even perma.

If you've have no prior punishments and this jumped straight to a 14 day suspension I think that's a little harsh.

Just my take.

Yes, it is warranted.

The logs for punishments show only your messages because your ban is based on only your behavior.

It's an escalating punishment system. 10 game chat restriction, 25 game chat restriction, 14 day ban, permanent ban.

Those are the only possible punishments. After you get a 25 game chat restriction, your next punishment is a 2 week ban. for the same level of toxicity that would warrant a 10 game chat restriction.

You can disagree with it, but Riot doesn't want toxic players in their game. Their ideology is 'stop being toxic in chat or stop playing our game'.  After this 2 week ban, your next punishment is a permanent ban. People have gotten permanently banned as soon as the very first game after their 2 week ban. 

Stop raging in chat, stop arguing in chat, stop insulting people in chat. Don't get reported. That's the only way to keep your account. Good luck. If you haven't spent any money on it, now's the time to just make a new one.

My last punishment was in may. So I played all through the rest of may and june without a hiccup, took a break until november, where I played 17 games and was told I was suspended for asking for reports repeatedly in that game and calling someone an idiot.
